title: Angles on an arc
brief_description: Gives proof of the theorem which states that the measure of the angle at the centre of a circle subtended by an arc is twice the measure of the angle at the circle subtended by the same arc.
description: Gives proof of the theorem which states that the measure of the angle at the centre of a circle subtended by an arc is twice the measure of the angle at the circle subtended by the same arc.
